introduction: A Gujarati language romantic film, Band Baaja Babuchak revolves around four guys- Bako, Pako, Chako, and Bahilu. They are dreamers and believe in making easy and quick money. One day, they come across an advertisement about an NRI girl, Simran, whose multi-millionaire father is looking for a groom for his only daughter. All the four guys try all their tricks to impress the girl; and after a few twists & turns Simran starts liking not only one but all of them. Who she will finally choose as her life partner forms the crux of the film.
